EmailTemplate.description: https://www.ncr.com/selfserv62 Subject line A: Explore NCR’s new cash recyclers Subject line B: Go in-depth with cash recycling
EmailTemplate.name: 02-22-22 BNK 62/64 Campaign Email 6.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: Explore NCR’s new cash recyclers
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Cash recycling technology is helping financial institutions across the globe run a more efficient self-service channel. It helps reduce cash-in-transit visits and the associated costs, improves availability, reduces risk and offers the consumer greater functionality. NCR’s new SelfServTM 62 in-lobby and 64 through-the-wall cash recycling ATMs combine digital-first experiences and the latest technology to put you ahead of the competition. Powered by the newly enhanced Scalable Recycler, NCR SelfServTM 62 and 64 are the perfect solutions to future-proof your ATM network. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
